scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_MODE=development BACKEND_ENV=local SOURCEMAP=true WATCH=true SHELL=browser PROTOCOL=http webpack-dev-server
scripts.build:browser: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_MODE=development BACKEND_ENV=develop SOURCEMAP=true WATCH=false SHELL=browser PROTOCOL=http webpack
scripts.build:mock: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_MODE=development BACKEND_ENV=mock SOURCEMAP=true WATCH=true SHELL=nw PROTOCOL=file webpack
scripts.build:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_MODE=development BACKEND_ENV=develop SOURCEMAP=true WATCH=false SHELL=nw PROTOCOL=file webpack
scripts.build:dev:watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEBPACK_MODE=development BACKEND_ENV=develop SOURCEMAP=true WATCH=true SHELL=nw PROTOCOL=file webpack
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production WEBPACK_MODE=production BACKEND_ENV=production SOURCEMAP=false WATCH=false SHELL=nw PROTOCOL=file webpack
